task: Start or stop the Twitch stream.
Schedule a future Twitch stream.
Change the title and category of the current stream.
Retrieve current viewer count and other analytics.
Manage and post automated messages in the chat.
Activate or deactivate certain emotes in the chat.
Initiate subscriber-only mode in the chat.
Run advertisements at specified intervals.
Create and manage custom chat commands.
Automatically shout-out to new subscribers, followers, or donors.
Create and manage stream markers for highlights.
Retrieve a list of current subscribers.
Automatically ban or time-out users based on chat behavior.
Create and manage polls or voting activities during the stream.
Display alerts or notifications for in-stream events, like receiving a donation.
Retrieve historical data such as past streams, viewer metrics, and chat logs.
Manage and redeem channel points or rewards.
Clip segments of the current stream.
Configure audio and video settings, including bitrate and resolution.
Host or raid another Twitch channel.
Initiate and manage a co-stream with another streamer.
Manage and update panels and other customizable areas below the video player.
Activate specific scenes or overlays.
Automatically archive past broadcasts.
Enable or disable slow mode in the chat.
Monitor and manage subscriptions to other channels.
Set up donation goals and progress bars.
Manage and send direct messages.
Configure and manage bots for chat moderation or entertainment.
